job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic Pega Developer to join our team and work on GenAI topics related to Case Management. In this role, you will have the opportunity to shape the future of our case management processes by integrating advanced AI capabilities into our Pega platform. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience.

   You and your responsibilities
     * Develop and maintain Pega applications with a focus on GenAI capabilities.
     * Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions to streamline workflows and improve decision-making.
     * Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
     * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies and apply them to enhance our systems.
     * Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention.

   You and your team

   The Financial Economic Crime (FEC) department at Rabobank plays a crucial role in safeguarding the integrity of the financial system. Our team is dedicated to preventing and combating financial crimes such as money laundering, fraud, and terrorist financing. We leverage cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions to stay ahead of emerging threats and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
job_details.full_text:
Pega Developer - GenAI Case Management

We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic Pega Developer to join our team and work on GenAI topics related to Case Management. In this role, you will have the opportunity to shape the future of our case management processes by integrating advanced AI capabilities into our Pega platform. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and implement innovative solutions that enhance efficiency, accuracy, and user experience.

   You and your responsibilities
     * Develop and maintain Pega applications with a focus on GenAI capabilities.
     * Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions to streamline workflows and improve decision-making.
     * Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
     * Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies and apply them to enhance our systems.
     * Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention.

   You and your team

   The Financial Economic Crime (FEC) department at Rabobank plays a crucial role in safeguarding the integrity of the financial system. Our team is dedicated to preventing and combating financial crimes such as money laundering, fraud, and terrorist financing. We leverage cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions to stay ahead of emerging threats and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing and maintaining Pega applications with a focus on GenAI capabilities, designing AI-driven case management solutions, and integrating advanced AI into the Pega platform. This aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and deploying AI-powered systems, even though the primary platform is Pega rather than a general software development framework. The mention of 'advanced AI capabilities' and 'AI-driven case management solutions' points towards generative AI applications.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing and maintaining Pega applications, which is a form of software development, specifically within the Pega platform context.

The description mentions integrating 'advanced AI capabilities' and designing 'AI-driven case management solutions,' which implies the application or development of AI models, likely generative ones given the 'GenAI' context.
Designing 'AI-driven case management solutions' directly points to the application and implementation of AI models to solve specific business problems.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement AI-driven case management solutions

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with business analysts and stakeholders to understand requirements is a key aspect of understanding the business context and translating it into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders to understand requirements

job_tasks.justification: The need to 'Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies' highlights the importance of continuous learning and adapting to new developments.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies

job_tasks.justification: Applying new technologies to 'enhance our systems' falls under the umbrella of software development and system improvement.
job_tasks.phrase: apply them to enhance our systems

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring compliance with 'regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention' requires a deep understanding of the business domain and its regulatory landscape.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with business analysts, data scientists, and other stakeholders
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Pega and AI technologies
Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices in financial crime prevention
